plot: When Melinda and Jim take a trip on a cruise liner's final voyage, Melinda finds herself faced with a heartbroken ghost, and the prospect of a mass crossing over.

Jim and Melinda board a grand cruise ship's last voyage as a romantic anniversary holiday. She finds it full of ghosts, including a murderous one who seems to have committed suicide. However it constantly attacks the wrong victim, and actually for the wrong reason, so the true tragedy implying her death must be worked out, then a reconciliation achieved.—KGF Vissers
